name: Balloon Pop (itch) (Extrone)
description:
Welcome to satisfying and confetti filled Balloon Popping experience.

In this game, you need to Pop 100 Balloons 🎈 in the least amount of time.

Popping the balloons 🎈 is so satisfying, you wouldn't wanna stop doing it.

Known Bugs 🐛 :

  • Music not looping
  • Resolutions settings not changing correctly.
